name: Sunshine Compound
blurb: A free-to-play, cult themed browser game.  The Great Lord commandeth we make fun of farming games and we obey!

rewards.reward: You earn the Bronze Hobo package which includes:  The right to vote twice for your favorite update idea at each milestone, a thank you e-mail from the Sunshine Compound team, access to the donor section of our forums, and your name on the donor name list. We look forward to hearing from you!

You earn the Silver Hobo package which includes: The special edition Sunshine Compound desktop wallpaper, the avatar pack, 25 PrayerPoints, your name in the Silver-Hobo section of the Donor List, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Golden Hobo package which includes:  The Sunshine Compound Starter Kit (game money, followers, buildings, and decorations), the Sunshine Compound cult membership card (digital), a digital copy of the Sunshine Compound dissemination pamphlet, 50 PrayerPoints, your name in the Golden Hobo section of the donor list, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Diamond Super Saver package which includes: An invitation to the Sunshine Compound closed beta, an amazing Sunshine Compound themed temporary tattoo featuring Jojo the monkey, a physical copy of the Sunshine Compound cult membership card, a physical copy of the Sunshine Compound dissemination pamphlet, 100 PrayerPoints, your name in the Bronze Acolyte section of the donor list, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints).  Delivery estimate does not include beta dev time.

You earn the Bronze Acolyte package which includes: An invitation to the Sunshine Compound closed beta, a special edition in game decoration, 100 Prayer Points, your name in the Bronze Acolyte section of the donor list, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards). Delivery estimate does not include beta dev time.

You earn the Silver Acolyte package which includes: The ThankYou Bomb! in game item (yes, it's a bomb that says, thank you and it's awesome),\r\nA digital copy of the Sunshine Compound spray paint stensil, 150 PrayerPoints, your name in  the Silver Acolyte section of the donor list, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Golden Acolyte package which includes: Your name added to the in game follower name list, a digital copy of the Sunshine Compound 3d paper mask, the HoboBomb!  in game item (somehow even more amazing than it sounds), 250 PrayerPoints, your name in the  Golden Acolyte section of the donor name list, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Diamond Acolyte package which includes: An amazing Sunshine Compound themed bumper sticker, a personalized thank you letter, 275 PrayerPoints, your name in the Diamond Acolyte section of the donor list, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints).

You earn the Golden Missionary package which includes: The opportunity to participate in the Sunshine Compound alpha test and the development process first hand, a digital piece of Sunshine Compound concept art signed by the artist, a special edition in game housing building, 500 PrayerPoints, your name in the Golden Missionary section of the Donor List, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Diamond Missionary package which includes: A Sunshine Compound themed drink Koozie, a physical copy of the special edition stencil, 550 PrayerPoints, your name in the Diamond Missionary section of the Donor List, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints).

You earn the Silver Hierophant package which includes: A digital copy of the Sunshine Compound official poster featuring Jojo the monkey, A special edition follower, 1,000 PrayerPoints, your name on the Donor List in the Silver Hierophant section, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Diamond Hierophant package which includes: A Sunshine Compound themed T-shirt, a physical copy of the Jojo the monkey 3d paper mask, the opportunity to help design a structure for use in the game, 1,300 PrayerPoints, your name on the Donor List in the Diamond Hierophant section, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints).

You earn the Golden Crusader package which includes: a digital copy of the Sunshine Compound art book, a Special Edition Celebrity with special edition quests, 2,500 PrayerPoints, your name on the Donor List in the Golden Crusader section, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Golden Alien Spaceship package which includes: A digital copy of the Happy Time Bakery official cookbook, a special edition production building, 5,000 PrayerPoints, your name on the Donor List in the Golden Alien Spaceship section, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints and physical tier rewards).

You earn the Diamond Alien Spaceship package which includes: A softcover copy of the Sunshine Compound art book, the opportunity to help design a character for use in the game, 5,050 PrayerPoints, your name on the Donor List in the Diamond Alien Spaceship section, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints).

You earn the Prophet's Diamond Club of Power package which includes: The Sunshine Compound Art Book Upgrade (signed, hardcover copy),  The opportunity to have a one on one, in person interview with the dev team (meeting must take place in Seattle, WA.  Travel expenses including airfare, lodging, gas, rental car, etc. are not included as part of the reward. Delivery date dependent on scheduling), Your name on the donor list in the Prophet's Diamond Club of Power section,  The opportunity to have our lead artist make a caricature of your face from a photo or video (within reason) which will appear next to your name on the donor list, 25,000 PrayerPoints, and all previous rewards (except PrayerPoints).
